page.title: 03CLUBS.
page.content: Penistone has many{clubs}(95) including charity,entertainment and sport.Penistone has two Brownie packs,three Guide troops,one Cub pack,one Scout pack and one Girls Brigade.Doing many different activities.Also Penistone has a reasonable sized Youth Club with disco's,trips and other entertainments. Newly opened in a converted T.A.hall is Penistone Sports Centre offering a wide range of sports activities for all ages. Charity organisations are very popular in Penistone with many people. Penistone has one Operatic Society producing many famous plays.
